DOC.brief_summary: This trial 2 x 2 factorial design , double-blinded , randomize control trial evaluate efficacy safety remote ischemic preconditioning postconditioning prevention contrast-induced acute kidney injury patient undergo coronary angiography angioplasty
DOC.brief_title: Single-cycle Remote Ischemic Preconditioning Postconditioning Prevention Contrast-Induced Nephropathy ( SCRIP-CIN ) Trial
DOC.criteria: The patient indication coronary angiography angioplasty . Impaired renal function reduce eGFR < 60 ml/min/1.73 m2 CKDEPI equation . Written informed consent . History contrast allergy . The patient endstage renal failure need hemodialysis . The patient take medication affect kidney function within 48 hour study . The patient acute kidney injury cause . The patient receive contrast medium within 2 week study . The patient cardiac arrest shock . The patient peripheral arterial disease ( PAD ) Pregnancy Refused study
